explore-p-1: Calm, clean and elegant, Aurora entice you to take time to relax and enjoy your vacations in a wonderful place, providing premium comfort and convenience.
explore-p-2: Fully equipped apartments that match your personal requirements, designed with high-end details to make your stay an unforgettable experience.

apartmentZukve.title: Aurora Apartment - 70m from the sea
apartmentZukve.intro: Our apartment in Zukve is a newly renovated 75 m² retreat designed to offer comfort, space, and the perfect Mediterranean seaside experience. Located only 70 meters from the sea (1 minute on foot), the property is ideal for families, couples, and guests looking for a peaceful holiday near beautiful beaches and nature. The renovation has just been completed, and everything is brand new: façade, windows, doors, floors, appliances, and furniture. Enjoy a clean, modern, and fully equipped home just steps from the Adriatic.
amenities: Wi-Fi & Smart TV with Netflix & Disney+
Spacious terrace with sea & mountain view
apartmentZukve.spaceDescription:
Our apartment is 75 m² and features two newly renovated bedrooms. Each bedroom includes comfortable beds, wardrobes, and Smart TVs with Netflix and Disney+ already available.

The kitchen is fully equipped with brand-new appliances, including an oven, stovetop, refrigerator with freezer, dishwasher, electric kettle, toaster, Nutribullet blender, and a Nespresso machine. You will also find all cookware and utensils needed to prepare meals. The kitchen area is air-conditioned.

The dining space is connected to the kitchen and offers a bright, comfortable atmosphere with direct access to the terrace. The bathroom is fully renovated and includes a washing machine for your convenience.

All streaming services (Netflix, Disney+ and others) are already logged in and free to use — no login required.

A large private terrace provides an outdoor dining area along with a beautiful view of the sea and the Velebit mountains. Guests may also use the outdoor grill located in the yard.

Private parking is available on-site.
